page.title: 16BUS TRANSPORT.
page.content: You can get a bus to York,Harrogate and Ripon about every 2 hours.The first 54 bus to Harrogate goes at 7.50 and the last at 17.45O on a sunday the 8.20 bus comes from Whitby in summer.The first sunday bus -9.20 the last bus 23.09.The first bus from Ripon to York comes at 8.04 and the last at 17.13.The York/Ripon bus comes at 9.35 and the last at 18.25.The Harrogate bus goes via Whixley,Goldsb- orough,Chain Lane,Knaresborough,Starb- eck and Harrogate.The York bus goes through Nun Monkton Lane End,Moor Monkton Lane End,Hessay,Upper Poppleton and York.The bus to Ripon goes through Whixley,Little Ouseburn, Great Ouseburn,Grafton,Bourobridge,Ki- rby hill,Langthorpe,Skelton,Sharrow church and Ripon.
